title: Sound On: Slavitt, Trump and Cheney
itunes:title: Sound On: Slavitt, Trump and Cheney
description:
Bloomberg politics contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino joins Hosts Jack Fitzpatrick and Emily Wilkins to deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guest: Andy Slavitt, senior advisor to the President, on the changing guidance on the Mask Mandates, how the policy will change the country, and what this will mean for the President's plans concerning reopening.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
